sentences: Jan Kleinbussink (born 1946) is a Dutch classical musician who specializes in the performance of old music.
He is the cantor-organist of the Central Church in Deventer, also known as the Lebu√Ønus Church.
Jan Kleinbussink studied piano, organ, orchestra and choir conducting, composition and music theory at three Dutch conservatoires: Amsterdam, Deventer and Rotterdam.
During the 1970s he was also active as a composer.
In 2007 he was included in the Dutch Order of Orange-Nassau.
